nodes.text: Coro Lanra was a scientist who had worked at the Czerka Corporation for over fifteen years on projects such as the CZ-X32 Sublimation Matrix. While working at the CZ-198 research facility, Lanra left the lab without a security badge, and the security guard refused to let the scientist back in, acting as though he didn't recognize Lanra. The guard then called the director on the intercom to verify Lanra's security clearance, and after the incident several security guards found it amusing to ask the scientist for a security badge whenever Lanra got a cup of caf—something that led Lanra to file a format complaint about the incident.
